Desc.entry: An anti-racist, football-based community project, operating in the area of social inclusion and community cohesion. The registered charity aims to use football as the world's most popular game as a tool to bring people together from different backgrounds to play, watch and enjoy the game and to break down barriers created by ignorance or prejudice.

Langs.entry: French, Gujurati, Punjabi, Spanish, Swahili, Urdu

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sun afternoon (football coaching for young people), also hold some evening sessions and weekend activities, please contact for details
